name: Interdimensional Museum
description:
The player takes the role of a Museum Curator who is tasked with retrieving bones of dinosaurs as well as remains of robot dinosaurs. The game takes place between a 2D past where dinosaurs are prevalent, the present which is a 2.5D museum, and a 3D future where dinosaur robots run rampant. The player goes to either the past or the future to collect pieces of a dinosaur model that will be reflected in their museum.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Interact - E
